Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show. programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service

It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. programme.title: Million Dollar American Princesses S2

programme.title: Gerrard: Born To Lead

programme.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: The One And Only

programme.title: David Beckham: Infamous

programme.title: Gerrard: Born To Lead

programme.title: Secrets Of The Great White Shark

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Comfort food, American style. We try hearty burgers at a hipster burger joint in Washington DC, dumplings made from an age-old home recipe from a Chinese mum in Denver, Colorado and enjoy some comfort food from a lofty American brasserie.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: On this episode, we explore all things seafood. From a famous fish dish in Buffalo, New York to the islands of Hawaii for an expensive fish dish then to an inland city in Texas, which is the last place you’d expect to find fine seafood.

programme.title: United Plates Of America

programme.title: United Plates Of America

programme.title: United Plates Of America

programme.title: Leguizamo Does America

programme.title: Leguizamo Does America

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Permission Impossible When Ra's parents refuse to let him go on the school camping trip, he sneaks away and gets lost in the Scary Woods with Casper and Mantha. What Possessed You? When a lesson in taking possession of a human body goes awry, Casper's human ends up taking possession of him!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Pat-Pat is meant to be giving a baton twirling display at the Town Hall but the stage is covered with sticky stuff. Clockwork Mouse and Carlton can clear up the sticky stuff but Noddy must investigate to find out who was trying to spoil Pat-Pat's show or they might do it again! Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show. She wanted to practise more! Noddy and Bumpy help Pat-Pat to feel confident about the performance and she gives a great display. Thanks, Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Tag and Scooch’s first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tag’s old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Athena thinks Lola no longer wants to have their weekly tea party, a tradition they’ve had as long as Athena can remember, Athena tries everything she can to get Lola to have another one. / When Tracy and Harper accidentally leave Wilford at home, on their way to the Fairhaven Pet Get Together, it’s up to the Dew Drops to get him to the park on time. But because it just rained, getting Wilford there clean proves to be a challenge.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Harper is missing an ingredient to make her Mom’s favorite dessert on Mother’s Day, Eden enlists the help of her fellow Dew Drops to do an emergency city-wide ingredient search! / When Marcus records a video of his inventions, Phoebe gets caught on camera and must erase the footage before Marcus sees, or her Dew Drop cover will be blown!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid she’ll embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.desc: When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.desc: Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. programme.desc: Goodwin’s troubles persist. Charles clashes with his former resident over a depressed patient. Lenox and Ripley treat a car accident victim who recently reunited with his college sweetheart.

programme.title: Chicago Med S10
programme.desc: The team fights to save the life of one of their own. Frost and Abrams butt heads with their patient. Dr. Charles and Dr. Reese continue to clash over a patient, dredging up unresolved issues between them.

programme.desc: A new, subsurface investigation on Skinwalker Ranch leads to a baffling discovery near Homestead Two.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S11)
programme.desc: In Idaho, Kidd and Harry Youren use explosives to battle a deep freeze to protect their cattle's drinking supply. In Montana, Jake Herak's young pups learn a big lesson in lion hunting.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: As time is running out, an exciting find in the swamp may have the fellowship rewriting the history of North America.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Building a wilderness survival shelter is far from simple, but it's even tougher to make it bone dry when it rains and smoke-free when a fire is lit.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: This week's challengers tackle a complicated build; crafting a working oven from all natural materials, like sand, wood and water.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S1)
programme.desc: The team dives deep looking for the biggest vessel to ever vanish in the Bermuda Triangle — the USS Cyclops. Was the USS Cyclops the victim of a terrifying, ship-sinking phenomenon known as a rogue wave?

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: As the river finally begins to freeze, the remaining survivalists struggle with the loss of daylight. One participant's snare line gets stalked by a predator; another devises a plan to defeat an enemy.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)
programme.desc: As the Cold War ramps up, a well-dressed man is found dead within miles of a nuclear testing site on a tranquil Australian beach. There are no clues to his identity, or what could have happened.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: During World War II, the Nazis created specialised Death Camps for killing prisoners. At Sobibor, a group of Jews were forced to keep the camp operational, engineered a daring escape that saved many lives.

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: Mike and Frank hit a down and dirty old-school pick in Illinois while Danielle and Robbie enjoy a high speed joyride in a one-of-a-kind rat rod.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: In the first of a four episode event we're calling SUPERSIZED, four smiths must salvage steel from a massive railroad track to make their signature big blades.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From clandestine nuclear weapons programmes to a secret Cold War bunker hidden in the mountains, we explore the unlikely people and surprising places behind the discoveries of the top-secret information.

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: In Alone's most remote location, ten new survivalists must survive north of the Arctic Circle as they face the cold and dwindling sun for a chance to win $500,000.

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: Mike and Frank meet some interesting characters whose collections are even more far out and ripe for picking.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 16, Day 4 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Yoshida Miyako performed around the world as a Royal Ballet principal dancer, and is now a top artistic director in Japan. She explains the challenges Japanese ballet faces on the international stage.

programme.title: JAPAN'S TOP INVENTIONS
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: heat-resistant labels.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Gonoi Rina made global headlines by speaking up about the sexual abuse she suffered while serving in Japan's Self-Defense Forces. She shares her thoughts now that the case has been settled in court.

programme.title: Hall of Laughter
programme.desc: An entertainment hall home to rakugo comic stories and more for over 100 years. A place to relax and forget your cares, food and drink are welcome.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Clam-Digging
programme.desc: It's spring, and a group of young men and women have come to the beach for some recreational clam-digging. The sea breeze mixes with the smell of freshly-cooked seafood. There's also love in the air.

programme.title: BIZ STREAM
programme.desc: This episode introduces companies that are helping experienced workers to find new ways of making use of the knowledge they possess.

programme.title: FRONTRUNNERS
programme.desc: Japanese researcher Takama Takeshi founded an organization on the island of Bali, Indonesia to study climate change and help farmers to adapt its effects.

programme.title: Smallville S1 5
programme.desc: Clark has a chance to share a night out on the town with Lana, thanks to Lex's matchmaking, but the evening is interrupted when Clark faces an icy enemy, Sean Kelvin (MICHAEL CORISTINE).

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 02
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q teach fencing, and one Joker is especially "en garde" when forced to face an Olympian. The guys trim away their dignity as hairstylists, and the punished Joker melts down during a presentation on climate change.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 1
programme.desc: Posing as a technician, Michael literally "gets the bug out" of a customer's phone and has him convinced it was in there all along. Then, as a seemingly ordinary bartender, he makes patrons fall for a never-ending beer bottle and a shot that breaks the laws of physics. Plus, he infiltrates an office and has gullible coworkers believing that he can freeze-dry animals and reanimate them.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 2
programme.desc: Posing as a cashier, Michael makes a shopper's face appear on a milk carton and tries to convince her that she really is a missing person. Then, in a shipping store he has customers believing that impossible technology of the future has arrived, likea bowling ball that can be mailed in a flat box. Plus, he has a hotel guest questioning her identity when he swaps her ID, and stumps a valet when he does a disappearing act from his car.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: Caution -- these people are operating motor vehicles under the influence of DUMB. TruTV is counting down the 20 most hysterical Motorheads on the road, in the sky, and on the water. See an out-of-control mail truck, a wild road-rager, and a man treating a motorbike like it's his girlfriend. Our cast of souped-up comedians, including Kevin McCaffrey, Chris Fairbanks, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Trainor have pulled up to the curb with plenty to say.

programme.title: Arrow S2 12
programme.desc: When Laurel asks the Arrow to investigate Sebastian Blood, Oliver is unsure whether to believe her accusations. But when they get too close to the truth, Blood strikes back.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 02
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke hack their way through the worst obstacles an airport has to offer, and viewers share their DIY solutions for whipping up cream. Plus, Brooke and Kevin find out how low prices can go if you're a "good guy."

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 02
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q teach fencing, and one Joker is especially "en garde" when forced to face an Olympian. The guys trim away their dignity as hairstylists, and the punished Joker melts down during a presentation on climate change.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 5
programme.desc: Lois makes increasingly bold moves as she tries to stop Luthor. Jonathan struggles to balance his personal life and responsibilities, while Clark learns an unsettling truth.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: Caution -- these people are operating motor vehicles under the influence of DUMB. TruTV is counting down the 20 most hysterical Motorheads on the road, in the sky, and on the water. See an out-of-control mail truck, a wild road-rager, and a man treating a motorbike like it's his girlfriend. Our cast of souped-up comedians, including Kevin McCaffrey, Chris Fairbanks, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Trainor have pulled up to the curb with plenty to say.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 3
programme.desc: Posing as a thrift store employee, Michael makes shoppers believe that a real waddling duck is just a lifelike decoy, and confuses clerks with a never-ending chain of hangers. Then, he convinces liquor store customers that some corks are made of cheese and a wine can freeze on command. Plus, in a museum he shocks a gullible new employee by destroying a priceless piece then impossibly reconstructing it.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 4
programme.desc: Michael convinces car wash patrons that he broke their window, only to miraculously fix it with the push of a button. Then, dry cleaning customers are confused when Michael is suddenly wearing their clothes in the blink of an eye. Plus, he has pet store shoppers convinced that they're seeing multiple fish in an empty water bowl.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Not to boast, but we've got 20 of the World's Dumbest Show Offs and they're about to steal the show! From an out-of-control security guard to a dancer who kills it at a funeral - they all need attention, and they'll get plenty of it from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike Britt, Rachel Feinstein and Gilbert Gottfried.

programme.title: Arrow S2 13
programme.desc: Arrow offers to train Roy so he can learn to control his newfound super-strength. But, Roy refuses to listen unless Arrow reveals his true identity, which Oliver refuses to do.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 03
programme.desc: Skip a trip to the spa with a facial hack you can find in any schoolkid's book bag, and learn how to treat yourself like it's your birthday - any day of the year. Plus, Brooke and Kevin go for a swim… in a garbage bag.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 03
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q host a team building seminar that's NOT safe for work, and later, they pose as caricature artists on a boardwalk. Plus, the wheels come off for tonight's loser as he faces a confused and unamused biker gang.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 3
programme.desc: Posing as a thrift store employee, Michael makes shoppers believe that a real waddling duck is just a lifelike decoy, and confuses clerks with a never-ending chain of hangers. Then, he convinces liquor store customers that some corks are made of cheese and a wine can freeze on command. Plus, in a museum he shocks a gullible new employee by destroying a priceless piece then impossibly reconstructing it.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 4
programme.desc: Michael convinces car wash patrons that he broke their window, only to miraculously fix it with the push of a button. Then, dry cleaning customers are confused when Michael is suddenly wearing their clothes in the blink of an eye. Plus, he has pet store shoppers convinced that they're seeing multiple fish in an empty water bowl.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 6
programme.desc: Luthor plans to move LuthorCorp to Smallville, but finds opposition in Lana. Sarah faces a difficult decision, and Clark confronts Luthor face-to-face.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 6

programme.title: Friends S5 2
programme.desc: Ross' new wife won't speak to him. Rachel appoints Monica her advisor in romance. Phoebe feels neglected.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Not to boast, but we've got 20 of the World's Dumbest Show Offs and they're about to steal the show! From an out-of-control security guard to a dancer who kills it at a funeral - they all need attention, and they'll get plenty of it from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike Britt, Rachel Feinstein and Gilbert Gottfried.

programme.title: Animax
programme.desc: Launched on 1 January 2004, Animax is Asia’s first channel brand specializing in Japanese animation – anime. Animax offers a wide variety of anime programs from across the most popular genres including action, romance, horror, supernatural, comedy to slice-of-life. Animax is home to some of the biggest anime titles in the world that enjoy great following across the region. In addition, the channel created TV history in April 2009 by becoming the world’s first regional broadcaster to air an anime series at the same time as Japan and followed that with five other simulcast anime series. Currently reaching 46 million viewers in 17 markets across Asia, Animax aims to offer anime for everyone. Beyond television screens, Animax also actively engages its audiences at local events, including its signature Animax Carnival that has rolled out in Malaysia, the Philippines, and Taiwan. See www.animax-asia.com for more.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. programme.title: AXN
programme.desc: AXN offers viewers a thrilling ride with an exciting slate of programs designed to exhilarate and help them escape the humdrum of daily routine. The leading English general entertainment destination among upscale, affluent adults aged 18-39, the channel delivers first run, exclusive top-rated drama series, blockbuster features, adventure and competitive reality programs from around the world, as well as made-in-Asia original productions. Launched first in Asia in 1997, AXN has become an international channel brand that is now seen across 60 countries globally including Latin America and Europe. In Asia, the channel is now watched by 154 million viewers in more than 104 million homes across 21 countries, including close to 50 million households on a time-block basis in China. AXN ASIA is wholly owned by Sony Pictures Entertainment and managed by Sony Pictures Television’s networks, Asia, which also operates pay-TV channels beTV, ANIMAX, SONY ENTERTAINMENT TELEVISION and ONE.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 99
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 111
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30's Political Editor Jacob Greber.

programme.title: The World - Episode 111
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 141
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 99
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: I Was Actually There - The Beatles' World Record Adelaide Visit
programme.desc: When The Beatles flew into Adelaide, they had no idea that the biggest crowd they would ever witness was waiting for them. Fans describe the life-changing experience of seeing the biggest band in the world arrive.

programme.title: Dream Gardens - Strath Creek, VIC
programme.desc: Michael McCoy revisits a garden built after the owners lost their original property in a horror bushfire. (Season Final)

programme.title: Four Corners - Episode 24
programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: Media Watch - Episode 23
programme.desc: It's the show everybody loves until they're on it. Media Watch returns with a new host. Sitting in the hot seat will be four-time Walkley award-winner Linton Besser, an investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 22
programme.desc: Coming to you from the Situation Room, John Barron and Chas Licciardello cut through the spin as they discuss the people, policies and politics from the week in Donald Trump's second term in the White House.

programme.title: The World - Episode 111
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 142
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 142
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's going on this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 142
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Star of the Show
programme.desc: It's Easy Entertaining, and Adam has lined up two stars, Opera Australia Principal Singers Esther Song and Christian Qi, to make food that's bound to be the star of the show.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - The Solomon Islands' SeaSistas
programme.desc: We join one of the first women to qualify as a surf instructor in the Solomon Islands as Nagarita and her team use their passion for surfing to empower girls by challenging stereotypes about men and women.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - Asia
programme.desc: We visit Sri Lanka and Indonesia to meet scientists saving some of our amazing animals, go behind the scenes with a plastic pollution warrior, and hit the stage with a fearless woman using humour to make a positive impact.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals - Episode 8
programme.desc: Eccentricity abounds in one of the planet's most isolated and unique ecosystems. This episode examines some of the most eccentric Australian animals showing that being a bit odd works out for these creatures.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Mallacoota, Bibra Lake, Narrandera
programme.desc: Narelda soaks up the beauty of Mallacoota with a pair of proud locals, Ernie gets a tour of the Bibra Lake wetlands and Bianca meets a fashion designer making a splash with her cultural designs..

programme.title: Fancy Fruit - Jujube Expansion
programme.desc: They're a mystery to many, but jujubes have been around for thousands of years. Like a small apple or date, they can be eaten fresh or dried. One Australian producer is investing in a big way with plans for export.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 22
programme.desc: Coming to you from the Situation Room, John Barron and Chas Licciardello cut through the spin as they discuss the people, policies and politics from the week in Donald Trump's second term in the White House.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 124
programme.desc: Live from Parliament House in Canberra we bring you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. We ask politicians the tough questions and speak with key players and experts on topics making news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 124
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Star of the Show
programme.desc: It's Easy Entertaining, and Adam has lined up two stars, Opera Australia Principal Singers Esther Song and Christian Qi, to make food that's bound to be the star of the show.

programme.title: This Place - The Yiwarra of the Ancestors
programme.desc: Ngalia man, Kado Muir takes us down the yiwarra to the Patapuka. He reveals the hidden secrets of the land, the same ones his mother passed down to him.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals - Episode 8
programme.desc: Eccentricity abounds in one of the planet's most isolated and unique ecosystems. This episode examines some of the most eccentric Australian animals showing that being a bit odd works out for these creatures.

programme.title: If You're Listening - Episode 22
programme.desc: The world is on fire. Inflation is through the roof, and AI is taking our jobs. What does it all mean? Matt Bevan explains the biggest story in world news while hiding in his basement from assassins and authoritarian regimes.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 19 - Essendon v GWS Giants
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: The World - Episode 112
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad & The Ugly
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible "Man With No Name" in a lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money. Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach also star in this renowned western.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad & The Ugly
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible "Man With No Name" in a lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money. Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach also star in this renowned western.

programme.title: World Trade Center
programme.desc: Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa

programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible "Man With No Name" in a lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money. Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach also star in this renowned western.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Before Holly’s husband died, he made plans for her. Over the course of the year after his death, she will receive letters, gifts, and instructions on how to be happy again.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood is the "Man With No Name," who teams up with equally lethal Lee Van Cleef in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic.

programme.title: Highlander
programme.desc: Christopher Lambert and Sean Connery star in the epic tale of immortality that launched one of the most beloved action-adventure series in film and TV history.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. programme.title: Jealousy
programme.desc: Model Min is admitted to a hospital, but mysteriously falls to her death at night. Rumour has it that the hospital is haunted. Subsequently, Min's photographer begins receiving eerie phone calls, the writer loses consciousness in a bizarre car accident, and her friend mysteriously disappears...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hell's Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qi's gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qi's husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Wilder
programme.desc: Following a triple murder in a small village in the Swiss Jura, Inspector Rosa Wilder finds herself facing a population in a state of shock. With the only witness to the tragedy in danger, Rosa's father, recently released from prison, seeks to get in touch with his daughter and grandson.

programme.title: Wilder
programme.desc: Rosa and her French colleague Jamel Jaoui are on the trail of the Jura drug mafia. Are they behind the triple murder? Simon Kägi, the principle witness, has hidden money belonging to the mafia, which puts his life in danger.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: And what if you left the reality of being human behind to explore the world as if you were an animal or plant. A well-known figure from Romandy takes up the challenge of discovering what it is like to be a totally different species, feeling and living as they do.

programme.title: La Peinture FranCaise Autour Du Monde
programme.desc: The collections at the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum also include works by some of the greatest modern painters, such as: Monet, Morisot, Van Gogh, Gauguin, Derain, van Dongen, Cezanne, Braque, Kandinsky...

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Au Pays Du Bonheur
programme.desc: A winter that lasts for two hundred days, only two months of sunshine and yet: Finland is in first place as one of the happiest countries in the world. Marc-Andre visits Helsinki to understand ''sisu'', the strength of character, connection with nature and minimalist lifestyle unique to the Finnish people.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Preserving the trace, refusing to allow memories to disappear... Valerie Jolly moulds objects that bear witness to times past, stone, pipes, things abandoned... from figurative to abstract, expanding the field of possibility...

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Passe-Moi Les Jumelles
programme.desc: An invitation to take a break and dream. On the line-up: emotions, encounters, travelling, favourites and breathtaking landscapes...

programme.title: Ca Pousse Au Fenua
programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: Cedric and Virginie visit a warm, authentic and artistic loft apartment, one the owners immediately fell in love with in this vibrant multicultural district of Brussels. Also on the programme: Fineo Glass glazing, turning a shipping container into a holiday home and how to install a decorative openwork panel.

programme.title: Les 100 Lieux Qu'il Faut Voir
programme.desc: Pilgrims have crossed France since mediaeval times, heading for Santiago de Compostela. Our epic journey follows one of the four French routes leading to the Spanish sanctuary: the Voie de Vezelay, in deepest Burgundy. We stop off at the Saint Front cathedral in Perigueux before heading to the Pyrenees.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: Cedric and Virginie visit a warm, authentic and artistic loft apartment, one the owners immediately fell in love with in this vibrant multicultural district of Brussels. Also on the programme: Fineo Glass glazing, turning a shipping container into a holiday home and how to install a decorative openwork panel.

programme.title: Passe-Moi Les Jumelles
programme.desc: An invitation to take a break and dream. On the line-up: emotions, encounters, travelling, favourites and breathtaking landscapes...

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Tobie Lolness
programme.desc: Tobie charges to the Low Branches to join Elisha. He takes on Leo Blue in a terrifying duel. Elisha has things to tell them.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Ca Pousse Au Fenua
programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Vivants
programme.desc: And what if you left the reality of being human behind to explore the world as if you were an animal or plant. A well-known figure from Romandy takes up the challenge of discovering what it is like to be a totally different species, feeling and living as they do.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'annee Du Requin
programme.desc: Maja, member of the Landes maritime police force, is reluctantly nearing retirement. But the disappearance of a holidaymaker has the entire coast on alert: a shark has been seen in the bay! Helped by her young colleagues Eugenie and Blaise, Maja seizes the opportunity for one last case.

programme.title: Panier De Crabes
programme.desc: A city-dweller in his 30s, who is recovering from burnout, stops next to a wild lake. Whereas he thought that he had found solitude and tranquillity, the place turns out to be not as calm and isolated as it appeared.

programme.title: Ma Gueule
programme.desc: 2016, during the European Cup. Stephane returns to La Louviere, his home town, to watch a match with his childhood friends, Luca and Cesare. When Italy wins, they head off to celebrate the victory in a Flemish night club. But there's a problem: Stephane is refused entry.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Leon has returned to his former home with his grandfather. Francis comes clean with his son and tells him everything he needs to know about the relationship between Marianne and Violette.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Leon and Florence are now officially an item, but Leon isn't as demonstrative as his girlfriend would like. Francis helps Leon to track down Violette.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: As Leon writes to Violette to try to persuade her to meet him, Julietta informs Ricardo that her biological father wants to get back in touch with him.

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: Château de Cadillac, its rich and multi-facetted history bearing witness to France's 17th century heritage. Artist and cabinet-maker, Kostia combines tradition and innovative design. Dries Van Noten bids farewell with a collection faithful to his years of work. From micro to macro-embroidery, Cyrielle Leclere explores the limits of traditional craftwork.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: In February 2022, when the war breaks out in Ukraine, Oleh Borivskiy's restaurant is bombed. He leaves the country to save his daughter, who has a heart condition. After a 3,600-kilometer journey, the family settles in Switzerland and starts over, determined to rebuild their lives.

programme.title: La Course En Tete
programme.desc: Belgian racing cyclist Eddy Merckx won everything between 1966 and 1976. A total of six hundred and twenty-five victories. In 1974, Joel Santoni made a film about the professional and private life of this great champion, nicknamed ''the Cannibal''.

programme.title: Nickelodeon SD
programme.desc: Nickelodeon, now in its 38th year, is the number-one entertainment brand for kids. It has built a diverse, global business by putting kids first in everything it does. The company includes television programming and production in the United States and around the world, plus special events, consumer products, digital, recreation, books and feature films. Nickelodeon's brands reach 1.1 billion cumulative subscribers in more than 170 countries and territories, via more than 80+ locally programmed channels and branded blocks. Outside of the United States, Nickelodeon is part of Viacom International Media Networks, a division of Viacom Inc. (NASDAQ: VIAB, VIA), one of the world’s leading creators of programming and content across all media platforms. For more information about Nickelodeon in Asia, visit www.nick-asia.com.

programme.desc: Nickelodeon, now in its 38th year, is the number-one entertainment brand for kids. It has built a diverse, global business by putting kids first in everything it does. The company includes television programming and production in the United States and around the world, plus special events, consumer products, digital, recreation, books and feature films. Nickelodeon's brands reach 1.1 billion cumulative subscribers in more than 170 countries and territories, via more than 80+ locally programmed channels and branded blocks. Outside of the United States, Nickelodeon is part of Viacom International Media Networks, a division of Viacom Inc. (NASDAQ: VIAB, VIA), one of the world’s leading creators of programming and content across all media platforms. For more information about Nickelodeon in Asia, visit www.nick-asia.com.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 37
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 52
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 1
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
